description:
A simple app to create georeferenced notes. A simple app to create and manage georeferenced notes (text and photos) on a map. The goal is to create the notes very fast and without any unnecessary interaction overhead. The typical use-case is to collect geospatial data which can be later uploaded to OpenStreetMap. Currently the basic features are:
  • Create, move and delete notes on a map
  • Attach photos to a note
  • Categorize notes
  • List of all notes
  • Show and follow current location
  • Export all notes in GeoJSON or GPX format
  • Hozzon létre és állítson vissza teljes biztonsági másolatot
